Kirby.Title: Kirby
Kirby.Description: Riding in on the spring breeze, it's Kirby! Inhale enemies and copy their powers. A galaxy stretches beyond your wildest dreams, so it's time to get going!

Gamble.Title: Gamble
Gamble.Description: This new friend from outer space came to Popstar to ask Kirby for a hand in defeating the Cosmic Fluxbender! Gamble wields dice, cards, roulettes, and magical energy to take down the enemy. Make them fold!

Meta Knight.Title: Meta Knight
Meta Knight.Description: The mysterious masked knight from Kirby's Adventure is here! He is chivalrous and always willing to fight any source of evil. All of Dream Land fears his sword!

Helper.Title: Helper
Helper.Description: Folks from all over have come together to help Kirby on his adventure! Play as a plethora of creatures from across Gamble Galaxy, from stubby Waddle Dees to invincible Gordos!

Gooey.Title: Gooey
Gooey.Description: While of strange origin, Gooey has a heart of gold, always eager to show up by his friends. With his ridiculously long tongue, he's happy to help Kirby along his adventure!

Magolor.Title: Magolor
Magolor.Description: 'Flux? I'll show you real power!' This tricky wizard hails from Kirby's Return to Dream Land. He used to be a lying cheat, but he's reformed... right? His otherworldly magic will make short work of your enemies!

Keeby.Title: Keeby
Keeby.Description: While not as adventurous as his friendly rival, Keeby seemed eager to join him on his quest! Can he take a little break from his golfing career?

Cutter.Title: Cutter
Cutter.Description: Wield a sharp boomerang to slash and dash through enemies!

Beam.Title: Beam
Beam.Description: Conjure up rays of electricity to flail around. Charge up to shoot from a distance!

Mystic Beam.Title: Mystic Beam
Mystic Beam.Description: The power of flux has turned our Beam into Mystic Beam! The beam shield doubles as an attack!

Stone.Title: Stone
Stone.Description: Turn into a rock and become impenetrable! What are these strange statues?

Ufo.Title: Ufo
Ufo.Description: Transform into an alien ship and blast enemies with lasers, pew pew!

Mirror.Title: Mirror
Mirror.Description: Use the power of reflection to send enemy attacks right back at them!

Ninja.Title: Ninja
Ninja.Description: Become an assassin of shadows and strike sneakily!

Bomb.Title: Bomb
Bomb.Description: Grab a bomb and throw it, but don't hold on too long!

Fire.Title: Fire
Fire.Description: Burn up the competition with powerful flames, yowch!

Mystic Fire.Title: Mystic Fire
Mystic Fire.Description: The power of flux has made your Fire stronger! No need to aim anymore, so burn your foes to the ground!

Ice.Title: Ice
Ice.Description: Skate around and freeze foes with your cold breath!

Spark.Title: Spark
Spark.Description: Mash the directional keys to charge up and zap enemies!

Yoyo.Title: Yoyo
Yoyo.Description: Slide into action and wave a yoyo with stylish power!

Wheel.Title: Wheel
Wheel.Description: Speed through crowds of enemies all while being nearly invincible, vroom vroom!

Artist.Title: Artist
Artist.Description: Slap opponents with your brush or paint up an army of drawngs to fight alongside you!

Fighter.Title: Fighter
Fighter.Description: Turn into a master martial artist and KO your opponents. Ka-pow!

Suplex.Title: Suplex
Suplex.Description: Channel the wrestler spirit by grappling enemies and throwing them around!

Wing.Title: Wing
Wing.Description: Fly through the skies with grace. Dash into enemies or send volleys of feathers at them!

Jet.Title: Jet
Jet.Description: Charge the engine to zoom forward at supersonic speeds!

Sword.Title: Sword
Sword.Description: Wield a sharp blade to slice and stab all sorts of things!

Parasol.Title: Parasol
Parasol.Description: Protect yourself from falling objects, whack enemies, and even fall slowly!

Hammer.Title: Hammer
Hammer.Description: Smash enemies with extremely powerful swings of a hammer, ouch!

Bell.Title: Bell
Bell.Description: Ring ring! Dual wield these loud instruments to compose a destructive song!

Water.Title: Water
Water.Description: Bend water to your will to power wash enemies. surfs up!

Scan.Title: Scan
Scan.Description: Use an advanced headset to scan and copy foes abilities!

Crash.Title: Crash
Crash.Description: Clear the whole screen with a single mighty boom!

Mic.Title: Mic
Mic.Description: Use your powerful singing skill to defeat all the enemies around you! CHESTO!

Ultra Sword.Title: Ultra Sword
Ultra Sword.Description: This huge sword can devastate enemies and your terrain with pure destructive power! Slice and dice!

Waddle Dee.Title: Waddle Dee
Waddle Dee.Description: The most common of Popstar residents. Many have chosen to work for King Dedede, some even choosing to wield spears or parasols.

Waddle Doo.Title: Waddle Doo
Waddle Doo.Description: These creatures are known to shoot a beam out of their singular large eye.

Bronto Burt.Title: Bronto Burt
Bronto Burt.Description: A flying foe who takes to the skies whenever someone gets near, and will try and ram into you sometimes.

Twizzy.Title: Twizzy
Twizzy.Description: A baby Tookey, never seen far from its mother. They are known to ram into others for fun.

Tookey.Title: Tookey
Tookey.Description: The adult variant of Twizzy that is always found near its chicks. It will ram into anyone who gets near its babies.

Sir Kibble.Title: Sir Kibble
Sir Kibble.Description: A knight of the bladed boomerang variety. By channeling his energy he can throw a larger blade.

Gordo.Title: Gordo
Gordo.Description: An invincible ball of spikes, yowch! Can break ability stars upon contact.

Blood Gordo.Title: Blood Gordo
Blood Gordo.Description: A very angry variant of the classic Gordo. This version's horns pierce the air, and it's metal shines like a red sun.

Shotzo.Title: Shotzo
Shotzo.Description: These cannons are a staple of the Halberd and Castle Dedede's arsenals. Can come in single shot and 3 round burst flavors.

Mystic Doo.Title: Mystic Doo
Mystic Doo.Description: A Waddle Doo warped by the power of Flux. By utilizing its new power it can create a beam barrier, which can also be launched forward

Bouncy.Title: Bouncy
Bouncy.Description: Such a pleasant little friend! Bouncies bounce up and down. A simple life, but a happy one. That little face looks familiar...

Mr Boogie.Title: Mr. Boogie
Mr Boogie.Description: It's a sentient booger that seems to walk aimlessly, but in reality it’s looking for some tissues.

Searches.Title: Searches
Searches.Description: A small bomb with a face. If you get too close, it'll detonate, so steer clear.

Hive Drone.Title: Hive Drone
Hive Drone.Description: A mining bot, built for the sole purpose of harvesting Alexandrum, a mysterious mineral.

Wapod.Title: Wapod
Wapod.Description: These ghosts look oddly like Waddle Dees. It's probably a coincidence. They pop out of pots like funny genies, and fly up, up, and away!

Flamebelch.Title: Flamebelch
Flamebelch.Description: An old candle brought to life by flux. Has a distinct dislike for sodas, as it causes it to have severe hiccups.

Cappy.Title: Cappy
Cappy.Description: One of the native residents of Popstar, these shy creatures will shoot their mushroom caps into the air when approached, and will panic if their cap is stolen.

Broom Hatter.Title: Broom Hatter
Broom Hatter.Description: These little guys have one goal; clean everything they can. This results in a bit of a bad habit, being ramming into people by accident. Despite their witchy appearances, they mean well.

Coconut.Title: Coconut
Coconut.Description: These palm tree fruits are packed with explosives to spread the seeds inside, but only fall when you run under, so watch out!

Noddy.Title: Noddy
Noddy.Description: An enemy who prefers sleeping over fighting, most commonly found near the Fountain of Dreams.

Blado.Title: Blado
Blado.Description: Shing! This angry fellow rolls across the ground, quick as a racecar, trying to slice up it's foes. This creature was devised by the mind of a mysterious painter, and looks a bit like a Gordo.

Scarfy.Title: Scarfy
Scarfy.Description: This deceiving enemy looks cute at first glance, but anger it and it will become rabid and explode after a few seconds. Cannot be swallowed.

Rocky.Title: Rocky
Rocky.Description: A sentient boulder that tries to crush threats with its body. Grants the stone ability upon swallowing.

Grizzo.Title: Grizzo
Grizzo.Description: A large bear that lives in dense forests. It can use its claws to grab onto foes and scratch them, usually when provoked.

Jungle Bomb.Title: Jungle Bomb
Jungle Bomb.Description: A small pineapple sapling. Jungle Bombs will puke up bombs at threats, up to 3.

Glunk.Title: Glunk
Glunk.Description: An aquatic plant who will periodically shoot water out of its mouth, up to 5 projectiles at a time.

Kabu.Title: Kabu
Kabu.Description: These ancient statues spin across the land, ramming into whoever is unfortunate enough to be in their path.

Burning Leo.Title: Burning Leo
Burning Leo.Description: A hotheaded creature capable of many fire based attacks, such as shooting a flame ball.

Tomatoo.Title: Tomatoo
Tomatoo.Description: A creature that looks a lot like a juicy red vegetable. Or is it a fruit? It will forever be a mystery.

Onion.Title: 'Onion'
Onion.Description: Onion, contrary to its name, is a missile like carrot creature native to egg gardens. They like to hide in the soil and ambush people passing by.

Anemonee.Title: Anemonee
Anemonee.Description: An aquatic creature with long tendrils jutting from its head. It dances back and forth to the waves of the oceans they reside in.

Gim.Title: Gim
Gim.Description: Gim is a fanatic of all things yoyos, and is a master of wielding them. Rumor has it their collection has over 50 different yoyos!

Poppy Bros Jr.Title: Poppy Bros Jr.
Poppy Bros Jr.Description: A trouble making kid with an innate love for explosives. Nobody knows where they get all of those bombs from.

Bobo.Title: Bobo
Bobo.Description: A creature that appears to be a walking fireball. Hotter than a Hothead, but doesn't seem to think very much.

Foley.Title: Foley
Foley.Description: Don't underestimate this guy by his cute appearance. This creature can fly and explode at will. It will drop out of the sky like an airstrike to explode, so look out!

Nidoo.Title: Nidoo
Nidoo.Description: That's no door! If you try to go through these fake doors, they'll jump up and try to squish you!

Como.Title: Como
Como.Description: Native to Grass Land, these arachnids dangle from trees, hoping someone will bump into them. This rarely happens. It's said there is a variant of this species that can walk on two legs...

Cairn.Title: Cairn
Cairn.Description: A stack of cute rocks. Very jumpy fellows. Boing!

Bomber.Title: Bomber
Bomber.Description: Highly dangerous enemy. It will leap from ledges and release a big explosion, which will hurt you pretty badly.

Simirror.Title: Simirror
Simirror.Description: A powerful magician, with strong mirror-oriented magic. He can create clones of himself, warp around, and more!

Yellow.Title: Yellow
Yellow.Description: Yellow like a lemon, very sour!

Red.Title: Red
Red.Description: Reminiscent of a ripe strawberry, yum!

Yolk Temple.Title: Yolk Temple
Yolk Temple.Description: Colors of the thriving egg planet!

Blurple.Title: Blurple
Blurple.Description: Discord's signature mix of blue and purple.

Beam.Title: Beam
Beam.Description: Bright orange of a beam whip!

Stone.Title: Stone
Stone.Description: You're gonna need a shower after getting covered in dirt!

Royal Yarn.Title: Royal Yarn
Royal Yarn.Description: Prince Fluff's default, It feels like pants!

Gamble.Description: Kirby's mysterious companion! He wants to help stop the coming threat.

Happy Pea.Title: Happy Pea
Happy Pea.Description: A plant has come to help?! He can keep foes away from Kirby!

Epic Jar.Title: Epic Jar
Epic Jar.Description: This scientist brings his inventions to help blow up nearby foes!

Krackle.Title: Krackle
Krackle.Description: This little cloud wants to help pursue the violet menace!

First Time Entrance.1: Hey there! It's been a while since you were last on the Lor, huh? Well if you've got the cash, I have some stuff I'm selling!

Entrance.2: Good to see you in one piece.
Entrance.6: Looking a bit rough, pal, why not buy some food?

Entrance New Items.1: I found some crazy stuff in the cargo hold!
Entrance New Items.2: I took a trip to another dimension while you were out, and I found some things you might like!

Buy Dialogue.1: I see you eyeing my leftovers, those are for sale too!
Buy Dialogue.2: I've got all sorts of helpful stuff!
Buy Dialogue.3: I'm sure I've got something that you'll find useful!
Buy Dialogue.4: Feel free to look around and see what I've got.

Purchase Item.3: I could get the Lor a new coat of paint with this!
Purchase Item.4: This should keep the lights on!
Purchase Item.5: Finally, I can afford that hairbrush I wanted!

Not Enough Money.1: I know you saved me and all, but you still gotta pay!
Not Enough Money.3: I'm not here to negotiate prices.
Not Enough Money.4: You aren't trying to stiff your pal, are you?
Not Enough Money.5: Don't try to guilt trip me into giving you free stuff!

Talk Dialogue.1: I've got plenty of stories to tell!
Talk Dialogue.2: What do you want to know?

Talk Options.1: Why were you at Egg Garden?

Why Were You At Egg Garden.1: Well, I had decided I needed a bit of a break from running the amusement park back on Popstar.
Why Were You At Egg Garden.2: It's not easy running that place, you know!
Why Were You At Egg Garden.3: I brought a friend with me too, but I think he may have gotten caught up in the conflict with that shady man…

Are You Okay.1: Admittedly, I'm a bit shaken up from that encounter with that man.
Are You Okay.2: That magic he used on me, something about it isn't right.
Are You Okay.3: Glad you knocked some sense into me though! Who knows what would've happened if you didn't.

You Have Hair.1: Of course I do! I keep it under my hood since it gets in the way.
You Have Hair.2: I wouldn't want my gorgeous hair getting stuck while I'm repairing the Lor!

Treasure.2: Check the [Collections Menu] to track your collectibles and treasures!

Anti Float.2: I sense an airless space here.
Anti Float.3 - Default: I don't know if that would effect you or not, but just to be safe.
Anti Float.3 - Kirby: You may be unable to float if you enter that area. Have to rely on your jumping skills.
